content.text: You came across a bush. Bushes may contain hidden tressure! To check whether a bush has treasure, go over the bush and press the E key. Would you like to see if this bush has any treasure!
Speed buff found! Speed increased by 15.

You were on a flight over the ocean when suddenly your plane starts shaking...


You are unsure if you can continue the flight as the plane starts to fall, so you try to veer into a nearby island.

You suddenly crash onto the island, but are okay somehow.

Your goal is to survive on this mysterious island and survive until rescue.

Use the arrow keys to move, spacebar to shoot, and E to interact. Are you ready?
Attack buff found! Attack increased by 0.5.
Health buff found! You obtained a health potion. Press F to use.
Ammo buff found! Ammo increased by 5.
Health potion used. Health increased by 3!

Congratulations, you have found a hidden repair kit!

Would you like to go back to the start to fix the airplane?

events.comment: Things that are always happening BELOW
